title: Power-available lights
fullText:
All socket-outlets or each group of socket-outlets for which RCDs are used as LPDs shall be inspected to ensure thatâ€”
(a)	they are fitted with amber, yellow or orange power-available indicator lights; and
(b)	power-available lights are operational.
NOTE: Power-available lights are not required for socket-outlets that are identified 'CLEANING PURPOSES ONLY'.
